ygData.subject: Alliance gets a free hand out.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Inu stops in mid attack and begins to repair Koj s damaged Neuro connections. This should help a little. ... Koj see the beacon blinking he gave Replay

::Inu::
Inu stops in mid attack and begins to repair Koj's damaged Neuro 
connections. "This should help a little."

::Koj::
Koj see the beacon blinking he gave "Replay all transmission you were able 
to intercept from KitKat's base. As Koj hears everything from her call for 
him to come with to the part about Destroying the Maximals to there plan to 
move. "Well Inu-Yasha your bug Beacon works very well."

::Inu::
As Inu finishes the repairs "The sad thing is she fell for the Ninja way 
Illusion is truth and truth Illusion."

::Koj::
Koj goes to his computer "Computer code all of Kitkat's voice transmissions 
and movements and send them to the Alliance base use a basic channel so that 
only the Alliance picks it up now cosign beacon. Also flat line the signal 
beacon so that it runs on pred signals so it doesn't register as bug."

::Computer::
"Koj mission complete."

::Koj::
Koj activates the beacon "Lady KitKat I'll find you later I have to train 
now hold on to the beacon so I can keep in touch
